title: Emerald Envy Jhumkas: Sparkling Fusion of Tradition and Modernity
materials: Base Metal: Gold-plated; Stones: High-quality cubic zirconia
features: Intricate filigree design inspired by traditional jali work, these Jhumkas offer a modern twist on a classic silhouette. The emerald stone adds a touch of vibrant color, while the pearl drop adds a hint of traditional elegance. Featuring a light weight easy to wear design.
colors: accented by Emerald green and lustrous white pearls.
occasions: Perfect for both casual and festive occasions like weddings (పెళ్లి)
description: These Jhumkas are a perfect blend of tradition and modernity. The exquisite filigree design and the vibrant emerald creates a striking contrast with the gold base and pearl drop. Durable and crafted with attention to detail, these Jhumkas are sure to be a treasured addition to any jewelry collection.
